original_title: I Scored A Goal In The FIFA World Cup FInal
overview: A series of 34 short documentary films for ESPN featuring testimony from the only men alive to have scored a goal in a world cup final. In the history of the World Cup only 68 people have scored a goal in the final (including penalty shoot-outs). Of which 34 are alive today.
tagline: Only 55 men have ever scored a goal in the FIFA World Cup Final. 33 of them are alive today. This is their story. Told both as individual short films and as an hour long film, this is a journey every boy dreams of making - yet so few on earth ever achieve.
title: I Scored A Goal In The FIFA World Cup FInal
